item.title: BNB Market Cap Surpasses Rolls-Royce, Global Asset Market Cap Ranking Rises to 187th
item.description: On August 21st, based on 8marketcap data, the market capitalization of BNB has exceeded $119 billion, surpassing Rolls-Royce and ranking 187th in the global asset market capitalization.

item.title: A certain Bitcoin ancient whale has reduced a $2.95 billion ETH long position, continuously selling BTC to exchange for ETH
item.description: August 21st. Based on the monitoring of LookOnChain, this morning, a Bitcoin ancient whale that sold 550 BTC of leveraged long positions on Ethereum is reducing its holdings of 68,130 ETH (approximately $295 million) of long positions and switching to purchasing ETH spot.In the past 6 hours, it has deposited 1000 BTC into Hyperliquid (approximately $113.95 million) to buy ETH. As of now, it has bought 19,794 ETH (approximately $85 million).

item.title: A whale is currently longing both BTC and YZY, with an unrealized loss of over $300,000.
item.description: On August 21st, as monitored by Onchain Lens, a whale deposited 2.087 million USDC into Hyperliquid. It then went long on BTC with 40 times leverage, resulting in an unrealized loss of $36,000. At the same time, it went long on YZY with 3 times leverage, leading to an unrealized loss of $288,000.

item.title: UnicornX will host a new UniCall Countdown AMA today at 9:00 PM.
item.description: August 21st. UnicornX declared that it is going to hold a brand new UniCall countdown AMA at 21:00 (UTC+8) on August 21st. The keynote speakers comprise Anna Ann (the Founder of Unicorn Verse and an Investor in UnicornX), Wang Xin (a member of the Fair3 CTO Team), Crypto Charity (a well-known KOL and Trader), and Archer (the Research Director of Unicorn Verse).It is reported that UnicornX will make the latest UniCall project public during the AMA. Historical data indicates that previous projects have achieved an average growth of +507.3% after launching UniCall.In addition, to commemorate this AMA, UnicornX will randomly choose 3 lucky participants from the X (Twitter) interactions, and each of them will receive 100 X Points.

item.title: Bloomberg: Bitcoin Traders on Edge Ahead of Powell's Jackson Hole Speech
item.description: On August 21st, as per Bloomberg, digital assets are experiencing a weakening trend as traders prepare themselves for the highly anticipated speech by Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell on Friday at the Jackson Hole Symposium.In the US, Bitcoin and Ethereum spot ETFs have witnessed outflows for four consecutive trading days, with investors' net withdrawals amounting to $1.9 billion.

item.title: Sonic Labs Announces U.S. Expansion Plan and Seeks Community Vote on Network Parameter Adjustment
item.description: On August 21st, Sonic Labs presented a community proposal indicating its aspiration to establish Sonic USA LLC in order to initiate its U.S. operations. The proposal encompasses the hiring of a Sonic USA CEO and a full U.S. team, the setup of a New York office, and the implementation of a performance-based employee incentive program. Furthermore, the company intends to enhance long-term deflation through a Gas Fee mechanism.Community members will engage in voting to determine the adjustments of network parameters: to approve the issuance of tokens for a $50 million ETF allocation, a $100 million Nasdaq PIPE deal, $150 million in S tokens for Sonic USA, or to reject all the aforementioned parameter adjustments.

item.title: UnicornX will be hosting a new UniCall Countdown AMA today at 21:00.
item.description: August 21st, UnicornX made an announcement that it is going to host a brand-new UniCall countdown AMA on August 21st at 21:00 (UTC+8). The keynote speakers comprise Anna Ann (Unicorn Verse Founder, UnicornX Investor), Wang Xin (Fair3 CTO Team Member), Crypto Philanthropist (a well-known KOL and Trader), and Archer (Unicorn Verse Research Director).UnicornX is scheduled to announce the latest UniCall project during the AMA. Historical data indicates that previous projects have achieved an average growth of +507.3% after the launch of UniCall.In addition, to commemorate this AMA, UnicornX will randomly choose 3 lucky participants from the X (Twitter) interaction, and each of them will receive 100 X Points.

item.title: Camp Network Foundation's X Account first post, hinting at an upcoming TGE.
item.description: August 21st. According to official information, the self-owned IP L1 blockchain Camp Network announced that the Camp Foundation has been officially set up, suggesting an upcoming TGE.

item.title: Binance Wallet has released the August Income Report for Alpha Airdrop, with the highest single-account earnings reaching up to $1616.
item.description: August 21st. As per official channels, Binance Wallet has made public this month's Alpha Airdrop Performance Statistics. From August 1st to August 18th, a total of 24 Alpha airdrop tokens were listed. If a single account sells at the highest token price, it can receive an airdrop value of up to $1616. If sold at the end of the first day of the airdrop, the airdrop value would be roughly $1175.

item.title: 「Brother Big Shot」 Huang Licheng Increases his Position in YZY Longs, Reducing Floating Loss to $20,000
item.description: On August 21st, according to on-chain analyst Ai Yi (@ai_9684xtpa), "Big Brother Whale" Huang Licheng has increased his leverage YZY long position by three times to 690,000 tokens (approximately $809,000), with an average entry price of $1.203. Currently, his unrealized loss has been narrowed down to $20,000.
